Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#168; Item 2.02&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On March&#160;7, 2024, Broadcom Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) issued a press release announcing its unaudited financial results for the first quarter ended February&#160;4, 2024. A copy of the press release is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and is incorporated herein by reference.&#160; The information in Item 2.02 of this Report and the press release attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 are furnished and shall not be treated as filed for purposes of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. Item 8.01 &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Other Events. On March&#160;7, 2024 , the Company announced that the Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend on the Company&#8217;s common stock of $5.25 per share. This dividend is payable on March 29, 2024 to common stockholders of record at the close of business (5:00 p.m., Eastern Time) on March 21, 2024.
